verbs.description: The senator [V: has] decided to pretend that Trump ’s hawkish pick for secretary of State is a secret libertarian isolationist .
[ARG0: The senator] has [V: decided] [ARG1: to pretend that Trump ’s hawkish pick for secretary of State is a secret libertarian isolationist] .
[ARG0: The senator] has decided to [V: pretend] [ARG1: that Trump ’s hawkish pick for secretary of State is a secret libertarian isolationist] .
The senator has decided to pretend that [ARG1: Trump ’s hawkish pick for secretary of State] [V: is] [ARG2: a secret libertarian isolationist] .
